Class MediaPlayerController

java.lang.Object
musicApp.controllers.ViewController<MediaPlayerView>
musicApp.controllers.MediaPlayerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewService.ViewServiceListener, MediaPlayerView.MediaPlayerViewListener
public class MediaPlayerController extends ViewController<MediaPlayerView> implements MediaPlayerView.MediaPlayerViewListener, ViewService.ViewServiceListener
The MediaPlayer controller.
